resources.string: Put your Credit Card in the back of the phone

CC NFC Pwner was made to read public data on contactless credit cards compliants with EMV norm, using the library EMV NFC Paycard Enrollment.

Source code of this app is available on Github: https://github.com/kr0no/CCNFCPwner/

For any questions or suggestions, you can find me at:
kr0no@ka0labs.net
